title: If I build a device containing an Arduino, am I allowed to sell that device or get more manufactured? - Quora

response.answer_text: To my knowledge yes. But since Arduino is Open-Source, your device will also have to be open source. So the code you use needs to be accessible to others. In addition, one would probably not use an Arduino in a product meant for sale but instead use only the ATmega328P-PU IC that the Arduino uses.
